title: Started 2025 annual report
body:
@chennes I just copied/pasted the 2025 top 4 from the agenda for now... Want to take care of that section?

@wandererfan Let's discuss what we want/need to put in the financial section (2024 and 2025) next FPA meeting?

title: Introducing the pre-Approved Grant
FOSDEM/FreeCAD day 2025

labels.name: Payment
labels.description: A payment to be done by the FPA

labels.name: VAT
labels.description: This payment has VAT

body:
### Budget

| Item | 2025 budget | 2024 costs (for comparison) | Paid |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Rooms: 3 rooms + mezzaniine for 3 days - shared with KiCAD | 2500 | 850 | |
| Catering: Coffee and snacks for +/- 25 persons for 3 days | 600 | 180 | |
| Restaurant on saturday night offered to FreeCAD participants who register, +/- 20 persons | 600 | 600 | |
| Printing of 25-30 T-shirts | 350 | 350 | 466.65 |
| Printing of 1000 stickers | 100 | 70 | 138.69 |
| Printing of 500 bicolor pencils | 300 | 280 | 175.45 |
| Banner | 50 | 50 | |
| Total | **4500** | **2380** | |

Also needed: name labels, a few printed boards, plastic board holder

Logo used for pencils: https://github.com/FreeCAD/FPA/blob/main/images/logos/FreeCAD-wordmark-mono-light.svg
Logos used for stickers: https://github.com/FreeCAD/FPA/tree/main/images/logos/misc/stickers

### Agenda

Ideas to be discussed at FOSDEM/FreeCAD day/hackathon:

* "Kliment session" on friday
* FreeCAD expained to KiCAD users on thursday
* GSoC ideas discussio

title: Ondsel Onward Fund
body:
The FPA has received a donation of EUR 40 000 intended from private, anonymous donors to rescue the assets and code owned by Ondsel, clean the code, open-source it and transfer their ownership to the FreeCAD project.

A project is being set up with former Onsdel collaborators to do that transition. This issue will track how the fund is used.

title: VAT Payments

labels.name: VAT
labels.description: This payment has VAT

body: This issue registers the transactions to/from the VAT office. Declarations and payments are done quarterly up to the 20th of next month. Operation details are registered in an ods file in this repo under accounting/$YEAR/VAT

title: Become a mentoring org for outreachy ?
body:
We already missed this year but may be a good thing to keep on the radar for next ?
https://www.outreachy.org/communities/cfp/

---

Blurb:  
Outreachy provides internships in open source and open science. Outreachy provides internships to people subject to systemic bias and impacted by underrepresentation in the technical industry where they are living.

Outreachy internships are:

💵 Paid - $7,000 USD total internship stipend

🌍 Remote - both interns and mentors work remotely

🕰 3 months - internships run May to August, or December to March
Work on Open Source and Open Science

Outreachy has internship projects in both open source and open science. Outreachy internship projects may include programming, research, user experience, documentation, graphical design, data science, marketing, user advocacy, event planning, and more!

----

title: official teaching/support certification for FreeCAD
body:
Hello!

I do not know, if the FPA is the correct place for that, if not, let me know that.

In the world wide web, there are many incorrect teaching suggestions for FreeCAD. Even there are people out there, who (not directly) claim to be "FreeCAD support", even they do not know anything about that.

Since FreeCAD is in the road to get 1.0 (even it will take a while), it seems that something like that is needed in future. So i thought, since it takes a while to build a structure for that, is suggested it here for now.

title: Setup a Stripe account
body:
Related to #15 

Problem: Hard to set up a custom amount.
See https://jsfiddle.net/captainapollo/atgycd2s/

title: Offer crypto donations
body:
Just because why not :)

We need to find an online service that accepts non-profit accounts, supports different currencies and can transfer to a SEPA bank account for not too big fees...

title: Freecad Merch / Webshop
body:
I mean why not, I'd wear it especially on fairs. (mostly to piss off the Solidworks and Autodesk Vars :) )_ 
Blender example:
https://store.blender.org/
There are complete companies who can do this for someone, but they will probably take a big chunk of money from it. 
I am not sure who Blender uses, I assume they do not print there own t-shirts.
I also have no experience with merch, so cannot really help in that direction. 
But maybe start with a sticker until the workflow flows.
The book from issue 9 is also merch I realize, but I was more thinking about the stickers and t-shirts.

title: Publish the FreeCAD manual as printed book
body:
* Revise the text for 0.20
* Format for printing (research automatic ways to do that)
* Research print-on-demand platforms

title: Create graphical / text material
body:
- [x] Official, press-ready logo and logo + text, white, dark and mono versions
- [ ] Flyer / folder aimed at companies
- [ ] Flyer / folder aimed at institutions / universities / schools
- [x] Badges/graphical widget for sponsors to display on their websites
- [x] Create a logo for the FPA
- [x] Finalize logo sheet (make it easily usable by other orgs)
- [ ] Make it easily findable by other orgs

title: Publish FreeCAD on the Apple store
body:
Need to check:

* [ ] What is the process to follow
* [ ] What are the technical requirements, ie. what do we need to change to our packaging process
* [ ] Are there any fees? If yes, are there exceptions for open-source projects?

title: Publish FreeCAD on the Microsoft store
body:
Need to check:

* [x] What is the process to follow (https://github.com/FreeCAD/FPA/issues/5#issuecomment-1511663700)
* [ ] What are the technical requirements, ie. what do we need to change to our packaging process
* [ ] Are there any fees? If yes, are there exceptions for open-source projects?
